meanings.definition: The quality of being familiar or well-known.
meanings.sent1: The familiarness of the old house made me feel at ease.
meanings.sent2: Her familiarness with the neighborhood helped her find her way around easily.
meanings.sent3: The cat's familiarness with the house led to it finding all the best hiding spots.
meanings.sent4: The familiarness of his voice brought back memories of childhood summers.
meanings.sent5: The familiarness of the song made everyone in the room start singing along.

meanings.definition: A sense of intimacy or closeness.
meanings.sent1: The familiarness between the siblings was evident in their shared jokes.
meanings.sent2: She felt a warm familiarness towards her childhood friend.
meanings.sent3: The familiarness of the hug made her feel like she was home.
meanings.sent4: There was a comforting familiarness in the way he held her hand.
meanings.sent5: The familiarness of their bond made them inseparable.

meanings.definition: The state of being recognized or easily identified.
meanings.sent1: The familiarness of the logo made it instantly recognizable.
meanings.sent2: His distinctive laugh added to his familiarness in the office.
meanings.sent3: The familiarness of her handwriting made it easy to spot in a sea of notes.
meanings.sent4: The actor's familiarness on screen made him a household name.
meanings.sent5: The familiarness of her scent lingered in the room long after she had left.
